pages.text: You've been struggling with your newly created "life" for quite some while now. The last one was not only dangerous, but also quite a pain to get rid of.$(br)Now that you've discovered Moonstone, the only thing left to do is to perfect your recipe. This time, though, to heal instead of flooding the world.$(br)Yeah, that's probably better. Maybe you can help out some people that come after you and were a bit more careless with it, too.
Removes 99 % of all self-replicating microorganisms! Apply directly to infected area.
